## PageManager class

PageManager is a helper class to manage the page interface. It provides methods to get and set nodes in the page interface. It also provides methods to move nodes in the page interface.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class PageManager 
```

## Example

const pageManager = new PageManager(PAGE\_MOCKUP); const node = pageManager.getNode('content.0.properties.children.0'); console.log(node); // { tag: 'h1', properties: { children: 'Hello World' } }
